Notes: A simple Boo variant for underwater sections that moves back and forth. It can be defeated using the Rainbow power-up or a Koopa Shell's light ray, causing it to drop a single Coin.

Obj_arg0.Name: Front Movement Limit
Obj_arg0.Description: How far it moves back and forth. Default is 800.

Obj_arg1.Name: Invalidate Shadow?
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, its shadow will be invalidated.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

ScoreAttack.Description: This object scores 100 points in The Chimp's challenges.
